objects.specification: A square fair booth floor covering approximately 6 by 6 meters, finished in a neutral light gray tone with a smooth matte texture, providing a clean and unobtrusive base for all booth elements.
A smooth, matte side wall approximately 2.5 meters high and 6 meters long, finished in a light gray tone to form the left boundary of the booth.
A smooth, matte side wall approximately 2.5 meters high and 6 meters long, finished in a light gray tone to form the right boundary of the booth.
A smooth back wall approximately 2.5 meters high and 6 meters wide, featuring a subtle branded pattern or logo in the center, with a matte finish for professional appeal.
The left segment of the front wall, 3 meters wide and 2.5 meters high, with a smooth matte finish, defining one side of the central entrance opening.
The right segment of the front wall, 3 meters wide and 2.5 meters high, with a smooth matte finish, defining the other side of the central entrance opening.

A bright orange-red rectangular registration desk approximately 2 meters wide, 1 meter tall and 0.6 meters deep, featuring a sleek modern design with gently rounded edges and a glossy finish to create a welcoming focal point at the booth entrance.
A bright red rectangular promotional display table approximately 1 meter wide, 1 meter tall, and 0.5 meters deep, with a clean modern silhouette and smooth lacquered finish for showcasing items.
A bright green rectangular promotional display table approximately 1 meter wide, 1 meter tall, and 0.5 meters deep, with a clean modern silhouette and smooth lacquered finish for showcasing items.
A bright blue rectangular promotional display table approximately 1 meter wide, 1 meter tall, and 0.5 meters deep, with a clean modern silhouette and smooth lacquered finish for showcasing items.
A bright yellow rectangular promotional display table approximately 1 meter wide, 1 meter tall, and 0.5 meters deep, with a clean modern silhouette and smooth lacquered finish for showcasing items.
A small seating table approximately 1.2 meters wide, 0.75 meters tall, and 0.6 meters deep, with a contemporary minimalist style and a complementary aqua tone to the chairs.
